name: SRKeyboardMetrics
desc: The configuration of a deviceâ€™s keyboard and its usage patterns.

items.name: var duration: TimeInterval
items.desc: The duration that the report spans.

items.name: var keyboardIdentifier: String
items.desc: The identifier of the keyboard in the keyboard list.

items.name: var version: String
items.desc: The version of keyboard metrics.

items.name: var width: Measurement<UnitLength>
items.desc: The width, in millimeters, of the keyboard in the report.

items.name: var height: Measurement<UnitLength>
items.desc: The height, in millimeters, of the keyboard in the report.

items.name: var inputModes: [String]
items.desc: The active keyboard languages in the session.

items.name: var totalWords: Int
items.desc: The total number of typed words for the keyboard.

items.name: var totalAlteredWords: Int
items.desc: The total number of altered words for the keyboard.

items.name: var totalTaps: Int
items.desc: The total number of taps for the keyboard.

items.name: var totalDrags: Int
items.desc: The total number of drags for the keyboard.

items.name: var totalDeletes: Int
items.desc: The total number of deletions for the keyboard.

items.name: var totalEmojis: Int
items.desc: The total number of emojis for the keyboard.

items.name: var totalPaths: Int
items.desc: The total number of completed paths for the keyboard.

items.name: var totalPathTime: TimeInterval
items.desc: The total time to complete paths for the keyboard.

items.name: var totalPathLength: Measurement<UnitLength>
items.desc: The total length of completed paths for the keyboard.

items.name: var totalAutoCorrections: Int
items.desc: The total number of autocorrections for the keyboard.

items.name: var totalSpaceCorrections: Int
items.desc: The total number of space corrections for the keyboard.

items.name: var totalRetroCorrections: Int
items.desc: The total number of retro corrections for the keyboard.

items.name: var totalTranspositionCorrections: Int
items.desc: The total number of transposition corrections for the keyboard.

items.name: var totalInsertKeyCorrections: Int
items.desc: The total number of Insert key corrections for the keyboard.

items.name: var totalSkipTouchCorrections: Int
items.desc: The total number of skip touch corrections for the keyboard.

items.name: var totalNearKeyCorrections: Int
items.desc: The total number of near key corrections for the keyboard.

items.name: var totalSubstitutionCorrections: Int
items.desc: The total number of substitution corrections for the keyboard.

items.name: var totalHitTestCorrections: Int
items.desc: The total number of hit test corrections for the keyboard.

items.name: var totalTypingDuration: TimeInterval
items.desc: The total amount of typing time for the keyboard.

items.name: var totalPathPauses: Int
items.desc: The total number of pauses while drawing a path for a word.

items.name: var totalPauses: Int
items.desc: The total number of pauses during the session.

items.name: var totalTypingEpisodes: Int
items.desc: The total number of continuous typing episodes during the session.

items.name: class SRKeyboardMetrics.ProbabilityMetric
items.desc: A likelihood of occurrence.

items.name: var touchDownUp: ProbabilityMetric<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The duration between touch down to touch up for any key.

items.name: var spaceTouchDownUp: ProbabilityMetric<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The duration between touch down and touch up of all Space bar events for the keyboard.

items.name: var deleteTouchDownUp: ProbabilityMetric<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The duration between touch down and touch up of all Delete key events for the keyboard.

items.name: var shortWordCharKeyTouchDownUp: ProbabilityMetric<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The duration between touch down and touch up of all character keys in short words for the keyboard.

items.name: var touchDownDown: ProbabilityMetric<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The duration between touch down to touch down for any key.

items.name: var charKeyToPrediction: ProbabilityMetric<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The duration between touch up on a character key and touch down on a word in the prediction bar.

items.name: var shortWordCharKeyToCharKey: ProbabilityMetric<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The duration between touch up on a character key and touch down on any sequential character key in a short word.

items.name: var charKeyToAnyTapKey: ProbabilityMetric<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The duration between touch up on a character key and touch down on the next sequential key.

items.name: var anyTapToCharKey: ProbabilityMetric<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The duration between touch up of any key and touch down on a sequential character key.

items.name: var spaceToCharKey: ProbabilityMetric<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The duration between touch up of the Space bar and touch down of a sequential character key.

items.name: var charKeyToSpaceKey: ProbabilityMetric<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The duration between touch up of a character key and touch down of a sequential Space bar.

items.name: var spaceToDeleteKey: ProbabilityMetric<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The duration between touch up of the Space bar and touch down of a sequential Delete key.

items.name: var deleteToSpaceKey: ProbabilityMetric<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The duration between touch up of the Delete key and touch down of a sequential Space bar.

items.name: var spaceToSpaceKey: ProbabilityMetric<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The duration between touch up of the Space bar and touch down of a sequential Space bar.

items.name: var spaceToShiftKey: ProbabilityMetric<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The duration between touch up of the Space bar and touch down of a sequential Shift key.

items.name: var spaceToPlaneChangeKey: ProbabilityMetric<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The duration between touch up of the Space bar and touch down of a sequential plane change key.

items.name: var spaceToPredictionKey: ProbabilityMetric<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The duration between touch up of the Space bar and touch down of a sequential selection from the prediction bar.

items.name: var deleteToCharKey: ProbabilityMetric<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The duration between touch up of the Delete key and touch down of a sequential character key.

items.name: var charKeyToDelete: ProbabilityMetric<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The duration between touch up of a character key and touch down of a sequential Delete key.

items.name: var deleteToDelete: ProbabilityMetric<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The duration between touch up of the Delete key and touch down of a sequential Delete key.

items.name: var deleteToDeletes: [ProbabilityMetric<UnitDuration>]
items.desc: The duration between touch up of the Delete key and touch down of a sequential Delete key for an entire word.

items.name: var deleteToShiftKey: ProbabilityMetric<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The duration between touch up of the Delete key and touch down of a sequential Shift key.

items.name: var deleteToPlaneChangeKey: ProbabilityMetric<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The duration between touch up of the Delete key and touch down of a sequential plane change key.

items.name: var anyTapToPlaneChangeKey: ProbabilityMetric<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The duration between touch up of any key and touch down on a plane change key.

items.name: var planeChangeToAnyTap: ProbabilityMetric<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The duration between touch up on a plane change key and touch down on the next sequential key.

items.name: var charKeyToPlaneChangeKey: ProbabilityMetric<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The duration between touch up of a character key and touch down of a sequential plane change key.

items.name: var planeChangeKeyToCharKey: ProbabilityMetric<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The duration between touch up of a plane change key and touch down of any key.

items.name: var deleteToPath: ProbabilityMetric<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The duration between touch up of the Delete key and touch down of a sequential path.

items.name: var pathToDelete: ProbabilityMetric<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The duration between touch up of the Delete key and touch down of a continuous path.

items.name: var spaceToPath: ProbabilityMetric<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The duration between touch up of the Space bar and touch down to begin a sequential path.

items.name: var pathToSpace: ProbabilityMetric<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The duration between touch up of a path and touch down of a sequential Space bar.

items.name: var pathToPath: ProbabilityMetric<UnitDuration>
items.desc: The duration between touch up of a path and touch down of a sequential path.

items.name: var longWordTouchDownUp: [ProbabilityMetric<UnitDuration>]
items.desc: The duration between touch down and touch up of the character keys of all the long words for the keyboard.

items.name: var longWordTouchDownDown: [ProbabilityMetric<UnitDuration>]
items.desc: The duration between touch down and touch down of the character keys of all the long words for the keyboard.

items.name: var pathTypingSpeed: Double
items.desc: The QuickType words per minute in the session.

items.name: var typingSpeed: Double
items.desc: The user's typing rate in characters per second.

items.name: var longWordUpErrorDistance: [ProbabilityMetric<UnitLength>]
items.desc: The distance from the touch up to the center of the intended key of the characters of a long word.

items.name: var longWordDownErrorDistance: [ProbabilityMetric<UnitLength>]
items.desc: The distance from the touch down to the center of the intended key of the characters of a long word.

items.name: var upErrorDistance: ProbabilityMetric<UnitLength>
items.desc: The distance from the touch up to the center of any key.

items.name: var downErrorDistance: ProbabilityMetric<UnitLength>
items.desc: The distance from the touch down to the center of any key.

items.name: var spaceUpErrorDistance: ProbabilityMetric<UnitLength>
items.desc: The distance from the touch up to the right centroid of the Space bar.

items.name: var spaceDownErrorDistance: ProbabilityMetric<UnitLength>
items.desc: The distance from the touch down to the right centroid of the Space bar.

items.name: var deleteUpErrorDistance: ProbabilityMetric<UnitLength>
items.desc: The distance from the touch up to the center of the Delete key.

items.name: var deleteDownErrorDistance: ProbabilityMetric<UnitLength>
items.desc: The distance from the touch down to the center of the Delete key.

items.name: var shortWordCharKeyUpErrorDistance: ProbabilityMetric<UnitLength>
items.desc: The distance from the touch up to the center of the intended key of a character in a short word.

items.name: var shortWordCharKeyDownErrorDistance: ProbabilityMetric<UnitLength>
items.desc: The distance from the touch down to the center of the intended key of a character in a short word.

items.name: var pathErrorDistanceRatio: [NSNumber]
items.desc: Sample values of the ratio of error distance between the intended and actual path.

items.name: func wordCount(for: SRKeyboardMetrics.SentimentCategory) -> Int
items.desc: Provides the number of typed words for the specified sentiment in the report.

items.name: func emojiCount(for: SRKeyboardMetrics.SentimentCategory) -> Int
items.desc: Provides the number of typed emojis for the specified sentiment in the report.

items.name: enum SRKeyboardMetrics.SentimentCategory
items.desc: Moods that the framework determines by analyzing the user's input.
